content: easy fingerless mitts materials 120 yds worsted weight yarn size 7 double point needles 3 stitch markers gauge 5 sts and 7 row = 1 inch in circular stockinette swatch size kid s women s men s abbreviations increase increase by knitting cuff into the front and back of cast on 32 36 40 sts place marker and join into a round the stitch k2 p2 for 2 round round begin knitting in stockinette stitch for 1 5 from end of ribbing k knit p - purl thumb shaping round 1 k2 increase in next stitch place marker k to last 3 sts of round place marker increase in next stitch k2 round 2 knit around plain round 3 k to one stitch before increase marker increase in next stitch slip marker work to second marker slip marker increase in next stitch k to end 36 40 44 sts round 4 knit around plain repeat rnds 3 and 4 until there are 46 50 54 sts on last plain round knit around to last increase marker remove marker k3 sts then begin bind off bind off 14sts for all sizes knit one more round removing thumb increase markers and begin k2p2 for 2 or until mitt is as long as you like bind off loosely in rib use the tail to sew up the slight gap at the thumb join weave in ends and wear with joy ©calypso knits 2011 designed by maggie smith calypsoknits blogspot com calypsoknits@gmail com
